data.title: Alan Ritchson to star in Patrick Hughes' War Machine
data.meta_description: Lionsgate created its screenplay with Hughes, who is best known as the director of The Hitman’s Bodyguard duology
data.text:
Alan Ritchson, the star of Reacher, is all play a role in War Machine, Patrick Hughes' science-fiction film for Netflix. Lionsgate created its screenplay with Hughes, who is best known as the director of The Hitman’s Bodyguard duology. Hughes co-wrote the screenplay with James Beaufort, and Lionsgate set this title in an agreement with Netflix.

War Machine is being produced by Alex Young and Todd Lieberman of Hidden Pictures, Rich Cook of Range Media Partners, and Greg McLean and Hughes of Huge Film. The film follows a group of US Army Rangers who come across an extraordinary threat amid the last day of the most challenging selection process in the world.
